mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Admin_Depart(admin_dep_cd, areacity_admin_cd, admin_dep_belong, admin_dep_nm) VALUE (#{adminDepCd}, #{areacityAdminCd}, #{adminDepBelong}, #{adminDepNm})
mapper.select: SELECT a.admin_dep_cd, b.areacity_admin_nm, a.admin_dep_belong, a.admin_dep_nm FROM Admin_Depart AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN Area_City_Admin AS b ON b.areacity_admin_cd= a.areacity_admin_cd;
